title: 437: Reality “Tea” Chats w/ Zachary Reality!
itunes:title: 437: Reality “Tea” Chats w/ Zachary Reality!
description:
(IMPORTANT: MTA info and upcoming BIP format is discussed in this episode if you are avoiding any/all “light” spoilers!) Today The Broads are joined by the amazing Zachary Reality to talk everything reality tv and pop culture! They chat Bach Nation, Logan. the happenings of the upcoming Men Tell All, the new season of Bachelor in Paradise, Zachary’s genius reality tv show ideas, Britney Spears, Addison Rae’s dad, The Kardashians, Tyler Cameron, and more! 

 

ZACHARY REALITY: 

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@zacharyreality

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/zacharyreality/ 

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/zacharyreality 

Podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/zachary-reality/id1556311114 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***KIWI CO: Get 50% off your first month plus FREE shipping on ANY crate line with code CHATTYBROADS at KIWICO.COM 

***TALKSPACE: Go to TALKSPACE.COM and use code CHATTY to get $100 off your first month! 

***GRAMMARLY: Go to GRAMMARLY.COM/CHATTY to sign up for a free account! And when you’re ready to upgrade to Grammarly Premium and get 20% off your being our listener!
